text:
June 17, 1957
- 2 -
5* The Educational Television and Radio Center hill encourage
ALL COOPERATING STATIONS TO CONTRIBUTE A COPY OF EACH
PROGRAM DEVELOPED BY THEM TO KENT STATE UNIVERSITY FOR THE
ARCHIEVES« Any PROGRAM SO DEPOSITED HILL BE SUBJECT TO
PARAGRAPH NUMBER ONE OF THIS AGREEMENT•
4* Any requests for preview programs will be sent through the
Educational Television and Radio Center, Kent State
University will charge the Educational Television and
Radio Center for tape used and the regular duplication charge
AS STATED IN THE MOST CURRENT TAPE CATALOG.
Kent State Unetersitt will submit an annual report to the
Educational Television and Radio Center containing the number
OF MASTER PROGRAMS IN THE COLLECTION/ NUMBER OF DUPLICATIONS
MADE SINCE THE PREVIOUS REPORT OF EACH PROGRAM; ADVERTISING
OR OTHER PUBLICITY CARRIED ON IN REGARDS TO THE PROGRAMSZ
NUMBER OF PREVIEWS REQUESTED.
The Educational Television and Radio Center will deposit
^ KAXT PROGRAMS ALREADY DEVELOPED BY THE CENTER AS POSSIBLE*
A COPY OF EACH NEW PROGRAM WILL BE DEPOSITED AS XT IS
DEVELOPED*
7m Any areas not specifically covered in this agreement must be
SUBMITTED TO BOTH PARTIES AND AGREEMENT REACHED9 A LETTER
OF PROPOSAL AND OF AGREEMENT WILL BE SUFFICIENT TO BE BINDING
ON BOTH PARTIES*
AS YOU CAN SEE THIS HAS BEEN WRITTEN FROM OUR POINT
OF VIEW. £ END ME ANY SUGGESTIONS FOR CHANGE YOU DESIRE AND
WE THEN CAM REACT TO SPECIFIC IDEAS* l/S WILL BE READY TO
START AS SOON AS YOU DESIRE#
Sincerely yours.
RM: caw
Ralph If* Hall, Coordinator
Audio-Visual Center
